acute_aquatic_toxicity.hazard_name: Hazardous to the aquatic environment Acute
acute_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: It was classified into Category 3 from ErC50=16mg/L of algae (Green algae) (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data, 2003).

acute_toxicity_dermal.rationale: Based on rat LD50 value: >5000mg/kg (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts), it was set as the outside of Category.

acute_toxicity_inhalation_dust.hazard_name: Acute toxicity Inhalation: Dusts and mists
acute_toxicity_inhalation_dust.rationale: An original object rat LC50 (1 hour) value is >146mg/m3 (4-hour equivalent >0.0365mg/L), 75% wettable powders rat LC50 (1 hour) value is >2.33mg/L (4-hour equivalent >0.583mg/L)(Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts). But the category could not be specified only by these data. Therefore, it cannot be classifed since data is insufficient.

acute_toxicity_oral.rationale: Calculated based on rat (female) LD50 values: 223mg/kg, 289.7mg/kg, and 301.9mg/kg (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts). The calculation level was 231.3mg/kg, it was set as Category 3.

carcinogenicity.rationale: Neither of the organizations had categorized about carcinogenic. But oncogenicity was not acknowledged (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts) in the chronic toxicity/carcinogenic test using rats and mice. So it carried out the outside of category.

chronic_aquatic_toxicity.hazard_name: Hazardous to the aquatic environment Long-term
chronic_aquatic_toxicity.hazard_statement: Harmful to aquatic life with long lasting effects
chronic_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: Classified into Category 3, since acute toxicity was Category 3 and supposed not rapidly degrading (BIOWIN), though supposed less bio-accumulative (log Kow=1.7(PHYSPROP Database, 2005)).

corrosive_to_metals.rationale: Liquid at a test temperature, 55degC. Test methods applicable to solid substances are not available.

explosives.rationale: There are no chemical groups associated with explosive properties present in the molecules.

flammable_gases.hazard_name: Flammable gases including chemically unstable gases

germ_cell_mutagenicity.rationale: Since there was a negative result in the micronucleus test which used the mouse marrow cells, which was the in vivo mutagenicity test using the somatic cells (Agrichemical Abstracts), we classified it as Out Of Category.

oxidizing_solids.rationale: Containing no oxygen , chlorine and fluorine.

reproductive_toxicity.rationale: Since although there is no effect on reprofuctive potential in reproductive test of rat and there is no teratogenicity in teratogenicity test on rat and rabbit (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts) and there is no the general toxicity to parent animals in the all of the tests, it is considered as cannot be classified.

serious_eye_damage_irritation.rationale: Since change of the eye which was adapted to criteria for assessments of irritation in eye irritation tests of rabbits was not admitted (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts), it was set as the outside of Category.

skin_corrosion_irritation.rationale: Since change that matches for slight stimulation criteria was not observed with exposure for 24 hours in the skin irritation test on rabbits (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts), it was classified as out of Category.

skin_sensitizer.rationale: Since the skin sensitization was negative in Buehler test using the guinea pigs (Agricultural Chemicals abstracts), it was put  outside of the Category.

substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.hazard_name: Substances and mixtures which, in contact with water, emit flammable gases
substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.rationale: The chemical structure of the substance does not contain metals or metaloids(B, Si, P, Ge, As, Se, Sn, Sb, Te, Bi, Po, At).

systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organ toxicity - Repeated exposure
systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.hazard_statement: May cause damage to organs through prolonged or repeated exposure (liver)
systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.rationale: It was classified to as Category 2 (liver) since the effects on liver such as hypertrophy of hepatic cells and lobulic peripheral hepatocyte eosinophilic degeneration, etc. is acknowledged with the given dose of the guidance value range of Category 2 in the long-term oral test using rats and mice (agricultural- chemicals abstracts).

systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organ toxicity - Single exposure
systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.rationale: Although toxic symptoms are observed by the oral medication test using rats and mice(Agricultural chemical abstracts), since the dose volume was unknown, it was decided that it could not be classified due to the insufficiency of data.
